Reviews.Title: Bad Sound
Reviews.Author: bayou.circle
Reviews.Content: This is a good phone except that everyone complains that they cannot hear me talking--it sounds like I am in a well.  I got Verizon to replace it, but the new phone had the same problem.

Reviews.Title: Worst phone I have ever owned, though I WANT to love it!
Reviews.Author: Nik C.
Reviews.Content: At first glance, I thought that this was the coolest phone I have ever owned!  I love the rubberized feel, the water resistance, and the GzGear apps.  It's size is great, nice and thin, super easy to read front display, even in direct sunlight.  Its perfect for an active lifestyle, EXCEPT, it doesn't work.  When on a call, the other person can not hear me.  It sounds like I am in a tunnel for a few moments and then the volume on their end fades to nothing!  So, I am stuck using speakerphone or a headset.  Upon searching, I found this to be a very common problem with these phones.  It would be the best phone ever, if it worked.

Reviews.Title: It would be a great phone if it worked!
Reviews.Author: StarBird
Reviews.Content: Ok my husband has been wanting one of these phones since the came out so for his Christmas gift I chose to order one from amazon due to Verizon no longer carries this phone, it arrived in a timely manner and seemed in good condition when we went the day after Christmas to activate the phone it worked all of one call and the sound began to fade away to nothing at all! On his end he can here fine on my end nothing, so many calls and visits to Verizon in the 24 hours following activation Verizon said it was a defective phone to send it Back for replacement so far I have contacted amazon and the seller it has been 3 days now and I still have not herd a word about exchange :/ my hope is the company do the right thing and replace the phone for one that actually works! Then I will add to review later ( I hope )

Reviews.Title: Casio lost their way
Reviews.Author: Classic1500
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone through Verizon, I had the old Casio G'zOne Type S, it was a great phone.This phone has terrible sound, it is NOT ruggedized as they claim, I dropped it from about 2 feet up onto the floor, it cracked the screen all the way down.I had to get a bluetooth headset for it because nobody can hear you with the mic in such a poorly thought out spot, all the way up by the hinge, and smaller than previous phones. I will never buy another Casio product if this is where Casio has fallen to in quality, they used to be great.There is a new version of this phone out, it's badly overpriced, and the reviews I have read were not any better than this phone.Casio needs to quit putting out this kind of junk.I wish I hadn't bought this phone, and I would say stay away from it, buy something else.My contract is almost out, and I will not be buying another Casio.

Reviews.Title: was not as advertised
Reviews.Author: kelly199
Reviews.Content: Item was listed as new and it was not working properly when we received it.  The speaker was broken and this is the third phone we have received.

Reviews.Title: Two Dead Phones In A Row!!
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: The first one I bought was "new" but upon receiving the item the Microphone didn't' work. The second one was "refurbished" as all of the "new" ones were sold out. The second phone, the refurbished, one had the same problem with the microphone where no one could hear what I was saying on the other end.The phone itself looked excellent, like new both times, and came in a nice box with battery and charger. I am just highly disappointed that two phones in a row were dead on arrival due to the microphone not working. I bought this as a gift for my father for Christmas and this is sort f embarrassing. I will be trying ONE more time and if this phone is dead on arrival too than I will stop trying.But be warned that there is obviously a problem with these phones with the microphone (which is an important part to the phone).

Reviews.Title: A rough phone
Reviews.Author: John H. Dean
Reviews.Content: I had the first Casio GZ stile phone & it is about 6 years or older and is still like new, I just find the display harder for me to see. The new Ravine has a better display. The phone works great. I find the flash light a great tool for looking at menus. I wish there was a charging cradle for this phone. I was surprised at how fast I received my order. Great deal!John.

Reviews.Title: thompson
Reviews.Author: thompson
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed using this phone and I like the way that it is so durable. I like the feel of the phone and I want a pjhone for just using basic calling, not texting.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: pd
Reviews.Content: This is an excellant phone. The sound quality is very high, reception 2nd to none, and extremely rugged. The screen is very bright and clear, colors are sharp, and phone is functionally easy to use. The quality was as promised and product delivered fast and on time.

Reviews.Title: Casio gone ravine
Reviews.Author: Todd E. Nielsen "wisconsin_2"
Reviews.Content: I like this cell phone a lot,you can drop it and still works.It looks live I'm not going to upgrade no more.I think this is the BEST cell phone them made.I like the Nokia 6205 also.The Exteneded battery last for almost 4 to 5 days without a charge.Carolyn & Todd

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: Dollie Dent
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this casio phone. If youre not into smart phones, this one is a gem. Its a good phone.

Reviews.Title: I dont need  data
Reviews.Author: Terry T. Draper
Reviews.Content: i got this phone because I have no need for a data phone and this is a great phone to make and recieve calls on and it is a tuff well made unit

Reviews.Title: Works Great !!!
Reviews.Author: judy craft
Reviews.Content: This phone arrived when it was supposed to even with the winter storms .Phone was as described and works really well.

Reviews.Title: One tough phone
Reviews.Author: Nature al lee
Reviews.Content: This is the only phone that my husband has not been able to break.  Most of his phone would last 3 to 6 months at the most.  He has had his now for 3 years. Just bought another one as he has warn all the numbers and letters off the keypad and it is starting to take a bit to recharge.  He works in a hot, dirty, sweaty hayfield in the summer, all kinds of things get on the phone...it still works.  He liked this one over the newer one as the outside is rubbery and won't slip through his hand so easy or out of its holster.  Highy recommend this phone. We got one to start with as his son had one and loved it.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof
Reviews.Author: Eric M. Metz
Reviews.Content: I bought this model brand new and was very pleased with its durability and waterproofing.. I eventually broke the new Ravine phone from playing too rough with it,  so I ordered a refurbished phone on here to try to save money... the phone is not waterproof, not even close.  I was able to drop my original phone into a bucket of water and it would still work.. not so much with the refurbished model.  I dunked it into a glass of water and the screen went black.  Now I was able to dry it out and the phone is working fine again, but the water seals are obviously not as good as the original, new model.  Its still a decent phone and it will do fine if it gets A LITTLE WET, or if you drop it out of your hands onto the floor.. but dont expect to wow girls at a bar by dunking your phone... it doesnt work so good with a refurbished phone, and you look really dumb :)

Reviews.Title: ordered from husband
Reviews.Author: Anita Thomas
Reviews.Content: was a fast delivery, was pleased with the  appearance of the phone. Quality of phone is not to Casio standard as was like the boulder. But overall pleased with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Not a new phone
Reviews.Author: FarmerGirl
Reviews.Content: This was billed as being a new phone, but its not.  Everything on it works fine and was blemish free, but I could tell it wasn't new because within a week the paint had rubbed off the center button.  I had an original one from Verizon for 3 years and the buttons never wore off.  These are very sturdy phones and I love them.  We farm and build grain bins so there is always dirt and sweat around.  It has taken some pretty good hits and it keeps working.  I also have a toddler in my house so it has survived her!

Reviews.Title: Best Phone Ever
Reviews.Author: Rochelle
Reviews.Content: Best phone ever, very durable and almost unbreakable. Water proof and all! Took it in the shower with me and it still works fine. Dropped and even thrown a few times and it continues to work. It is the best phone i honestly ever owned. Built to last that's for sure!

Reviews.Title: Casio GzOne Ravine Verizon
Reviews.Author: Kimberly A Jamison
Reviews.Content: Great phone in great condition.  Just want my husband wanted since he doesn't use I phones.  Small and compact and fits on his belt.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: Got it for my husband for a birthday gift. He love's it! He say's it's the first phone he has where he doesn't have to be gentle with. Strong and durable! I love it too!

Reviews.Title: One very tough phone !!!
Reviews.Author: Giterduun
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone to replace the exact same phone I have because it quit working after 3 years. These are very tough easy to use phones. I am very hard on cell phones and this takes the abuse. I had a concern when it arrived, it was not in the original box, not sure why. They are advertised as new, not reconditioned, so where is the original box ?? After 5 months or so of using, it works very well..

Reviews.Title: buy one
Reviews.Author: minipini
Reviews.Content: I have totally immersed this phone on several occasions,dropped it from a ten foot platform to concrete,had it run over by a large forklift while flipped open and it wont die!

Reviews.Title: OK but not like new - the people on the other end get feedback when I use the speaker phone so much that I can't use the speaker
Reviews.Author: Elaine R Brown
Reviews.Content: I tried several ways to eliminate or limit the feedback, but to no avail.  I like the speaker phone option so that is a large disappointment, but otherwise the phone works as expected.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound quality and bad reception
Reviews.Author: Clammy C
Reviews.Content: I had the old Casio G'zone S Type, and that was probably the best phone I've ever had. It was tough, waterproof, looked cool, and was very comfortable to use, with good reception and sound quality. The Ravine is rugged and waterproof like the old one, but for a phone, it performs terribly. Most annoying is the microphone placement, high up and on the right side of the phone. It is incredibly awkward. You have to hold the phone at a really unnatural angle to be heard well, and if you are holding the phone on your left side, no one will be able to hear you. The microphone also traps water in the little recess, and you have to blow into it after it gets wet, or the little bit of water blocks the sound. A towel won't get the water out. Next, the reception on this phone is the worst of any phone I've ever had. I get more dropped calls, volume that fades in and out, moments of silence, and static interference. If that isn't enough to dissuade you, the phone is also very uncomfortable to hold against your face. That wins it another "worst" distinction, that of being the least comfortable or ergonomic of any phone I've ever used. I cannot wait to replace it. The waterproof and rugged characteristics are pretty much rendered moot because I never want to talk on this phone. I talk to my out of town friends much less since buying this phone because it's so uncomfortable and the call quality is always poor. Don't buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: Worst ever
Reviews.Author: Derek
Reviews.Content: This is far and away the worst phone we have ever owned, poor sound, battery life of 5-7 hours, poor button depression.

Reviews.Title: cell phone purchase
Reviews.Author: Ricky Smiley
Reviews.Content: The phone was as described and is a new phone. It works great. About 50.00 too high though. Should be 100.00 for this older model

Reviews.Title: No more Casio...
Reviews.Author: John F. Moore
Reviews.Content: I bought my Casio G'zone Ravine on a recommendation by a guy who is in the field a lot.  I was told it was waterproof and shockproof.  Well, I dropped mine into a two-inch deep cup of coffee and that took care of the audio, unless I use the speaker function.  So much for waterproof.I put in an insurance claim through Asurion, Verizon's insurance carrier, and got another one that would, under no circumstances, down load my address book.  I sent it back to Asurion and am waiting for a refund of my deductible.  Fat chance.The microphone location on the G'zone Ravine is nothing less than pathetic.  It's up by the hinge and people have a problem hearing me.Buying this phone was a mistake, which I will partially rectify by writing this scathing review and never buying another Casio phone again.

Reviews.Title: Awsome Product
Reviews.Author: Teri LaCoy
Reviews.Content: Awesome product this phone was the greatest thing I've gotten better than what happened when I tried buying this on eBay I got spammed I was eternally grateful when I got it from amazon. This phone has everything I wanted to fit my needs. It has a compass and much more. I kinda think of it as a survival phone.

Reviews.Title: the phone
Reviews.Author: sailing "midget"
Reviews.Content: My husband is nuts for this phone.Wroks great. I thing that i may order another one for him just in case. Wonderful seller.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Phone
Reviews.Author: Adam Glowacki
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement phone to a phone that my father already bought. What else is there to say about these phones that was not already said in the past. For a technically challenged individual a old style flip phone like this is the way to go. Does nothing special. The only plus is, its built a bit more robust than the other phones out there. So durability wise it is better than most.

Reviews.Title: DIDNT WORK
Reviews.Author: pam
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE HAS TO BE ON SPEAKER PHONE FOR ANYONE TO HEAR YOU.  Although the seller did send a RMA for returning,  I have to find a replacement first so I am not without a phone.  Do not buy this type of phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Bob Imblum
Reviews.Content: This is the only heavy duty multi function phone available, I needed one that was water resistant and handle construction work

Reviews.Title: The best indestructable (almost) contractor's phone
Reviews.Author: E. Roberts
Reviews.Content: I have been using this model of phone in my business since they first came out. The first 3 I had lasted less than 3 months. In spite of the promise of "drop-proof", one single drop onto a hard surface and either the outside or the inside screen failed. They were replaced under warranty and those phones lasted for years. One caveat: make sure that the battery cover door latch is in the locked position! One of our phones fell onto rocks, the unlatched door and battery popped off, and then it fell into the ocean. Despite the fall on the rocks, both screens still worked. Unfortunately the salt water got to the electronics and it wouldn't completely boot-up anymore. So I bought 2 more from Amazon. I tried to get them through Verizon (I was eligible for an upgrade) but they told me that the Ravine II was all that was available. They wanted almost $300 per phone - with my discount for renewing my contract for another 2 years! Amazon's price for 2 phones plus priority shipping was less than that.The process for enabling the phone to use the old phone number was automated and quick - didn't have to talk to Verizon at all. These are new phones, not reconditioned. The only advantage I can see that a Ravine II has over this phone is that the buttons are laid out in a rectangular grid instead of staggered like the original Ravine. If you text a lot the staggered layout of the original Ravine takes some getting used to.

Reviews.Title: GZone phone
Reviews.Author: Bob St Denis
Reviews.Content: I thought I woul reall like this phone as my wife has one. I'm not really thrilled about the battery life it gets. I have to charge this phone every other day with little use. I will be buying a new battery from interstate battery and hope this fixes the problem.

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: keebler
Reviews.Content: This fits my phone better than the other case I got. Thank you. You can not get these at Verizon Wireless any more.

Reviews.Title: Solid Phone
Reviews.Author: Scott Gappelberg
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone. Its really sturdy and built well. Its easy to use and hard to lose or break.

Reviews.Title: Great cell phone!
Reviews.Author: jeddiknight
Reviews.Content: I have had this cell phone for a couple of weeks now and I think its great.  I would like to be able to flip it open from the bottom rather than the side (unfortunately, it's just not designed that way) but aside from that I really like it.  Just a good basic flip phone I think.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone and received it and activated it. It worked for about 2 weeks and then would not take a charge anymore. I figured I'd email New2YouCellular hoping they could help me out, even though it had been two weeks later.They went above and beyond to help me out. First, they replied back to my email almost instantaneous and offered several options to fix the problem. The next day, they shipped a new battery out and it came within a day. Unfortunately, that did not fix my problem, so I contacted them again saying I received the battery and it did not work, and within a few days, they shipped a brand new phone to me. We received it and it is working great!New2YouCellular satisfied my needs and then some. They have great customer service, and if a problem should occur with one of their products, do not worry, they will fix it and make it right for you. I recommend New2YouCellular for all of your electronic needs! I am telling all of my friends and family about them and about their superb customer service!Thanks again for everything guys!Richard

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Casio G'zOne Ravine C751 Rugged Used Cell Phone Verizon
